channel.title: difference between Tor and Tor Browser
channel.description: Hi I was reading the documents and I saw this https://gyazo.com/456252257a452eb61c3c8de29d5c8a55 I did not know there was a difference between Tor and Tor Browser what exactly is the difference? this is the exact page https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Browser#AppArmor_Confinement when someone mentions Tor do they mean the project in itself?

item.title: difference between Tor and Tor Browser

item.source: difference between Tor and Tor Browser

item.title: difference between Tor and Tor Browser
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
• torproject(.org) the developers
  • Tor -> The Onion Router, proxy software -> https://www.torproject.org/about/overview.html.en
  • Tor Browser -> a browser optimized for use with Tor -> https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Browser

Read full topic
